attributes.additional_details: Just to prove we back Boris and his leave campaign even though parliament have proved they won’t listen to the people this petition saves us going out to vote again for nothing
attributes.background: Petition to show the majority still back Boris no matter what spin the leavers put on it

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign a petition about the UK leaving the European Union, for example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347
